statements: SELECT * FROM player_feedback
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating >= 4.5
SELECT player_id, game_id FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE game_id = 10 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY player_id, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM player_feedback GROUP BY game_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_feedbacks < 3 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE rating < 3
SELECT game_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_text ASC
SELECT * FROM GameReviews WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM PlayerFeedback GROUP BY game_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 1 OR player_id = 2;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY review_id;
SELECT * FROM GameReviews WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'J%' AND review_text LIKE '%awesome%';
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, player_id, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT improvement_id, game_id, improvement_text FROM GameImprovements WHERE implementation_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM PlayerFeedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_rating > 20;
SELECT player_id, feedback_date FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT game_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM GameReviews GROUP BY game_id HAVING avg_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, game_genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT game_title, game_genre FROM games WHERE release_date < '2020-01-01'
SELECT player_name, review_text, rating FROM players p JOIN reviews r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE r.rating > 4
SELECT game_title, review_text, rating FROM games g JOIN reviews r ON g.game_id = r.game_id WHERE r.review_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM players p JOIN feedback f ON p.player_id = f.player_id WHERE f.feedback_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM Players WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre FROM Games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM Reviews WHERE review_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT * FROM Games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM Games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, review_text, review_rating FROM Players JOIN Reviews ON Players.player_id = Reviews.player_id;
